extension.name: Content - MUE
extension.author: DtD Productions
extension.description: This plugin will ouput the current user information form MUE, using the MUE fieldname. Guests will see nothing for MUE fields and guest or 0 for user id if not logged in. {mgetuid} - User ID, {mgetuser} - User Name, {mgetuname} - Users Name, {mgetueml} - Users email, {muedata} - all MUE data, {mussubsince} - Sub since, {mussubexp} - MUE Sub exp, {mussubdaysleft} - MUS SUb Days Left, {mue_filedname) - MUE Field with fieldname.
